itt.t00154755.mouseserver

Class AppServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • itt.t00154755.mouseserver.ServerUtils
      • itt.t00154755.mouseserver.Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class AppServer
extends AppServerUtils
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class creates a stream connection using the Bluecove API. The stream listens for a RFComm client once a client is found the stream connection is closed, to ensure that only one client is connected. The value passed form the connection string are used to created the service record on the client side.

    http://bluecove.org/bluecove/apidocs/index.html?javax/bluetooth/L2CAPConnectionNotifier.html

    http://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/networking/index.html

    http://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/essential/exceptions/index.html

    http://www.miniware.net/mobile/articles/viewarticle.php?id=22

    Since:
    26/04/2013
